alert.note: Alert for Mercer (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:03AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Smyth, Tazewell, Bland, Wythe and southwestern Mercer Counties through 300 AM EDT... At 203 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Allison Gap, or over Saltville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bluefield... Wytheville... Bland... Princeton... Marion... Richlands... and Tazewell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
